.. py:function:: ampp_field(dl_path, out_model, x, y, dx, dy, dz, res)

   Creates a model of coronal magnetic fields, including potential, nlfff and thermal corona model

   :param dl_path: Path to the folder where downloaded files (HMI magnetograms) are stored
   :type dl_path: str
   :param out_model: Path to output HDF5 model file (.h5)
   :type out_model: str
   :param x: X coordinate of active region center (arcsec)
   :type x: float
   :param y: Y coordinate of active region center (arcsec)
   :type y: float
   :param dx: number of voxels in X direction
   :type dx: int
   :param dy: number of voxels in Y direction
   :type dy: int
   :param dz: number of voxels in Z (vertical, to corona) direction
   :type dz: int
   :param res:
   :type res: dimensional astropy Quantity

   :returns: None
